citations.narrative:
There were no fecal samples taken to monitor for internal parasites for the adult dogs in the last 12 months. The written
program of veterinary care states that composite fecal samples for adult dogs will be conducted at least annually. Failure
to conduct annual fecal samples can affect the preventative program established to monitor for internal parasites for the
adult dogs. Licensee must follow the written program on file for fecal sampling for the adult dogs. Correct by April 10,
2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.13(a)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
There were no fecal samples taken to monitor for internal parasites for the adult dogs in the last 12 months. The written 
program of veterinary care states that composite fecal samples for adult dogs will be conducted at least annually. Failure 
to conduct annual fecal samples can affect the preventative program established to monitor for internal parasites for the 
adult dogs. Licensee must follow the written program on file for fecal sampling for the adult dogs. Correct by April 10, 
2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
